sentence.Network_en: The climate has grown more equable and the crop yields have risen.

sentence.Network_en: He was a fine person to work with and he was very equable and a patient man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个非常平和而且有耐心的人，和他一起工作很愉快。

sentence.Network_en: He was a man of the most equable temper.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个脾气非常好的人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'fair, equitable'): from Latin aequabilis, from aequare 'make equal' (see equate)

entry.tran: 心平气和的;性情温和的；平和的
entry.def: If you describe someone as equable, you mean that they are calm, cheerful, and fair with other people, even in difficult circumstances.

example.ex: He was a man of the most equable temper...
example.tran: 他是个脾气非常好的人。

example.ex: He was a fine person to work with and he was very equable and a patient man.
example.tran: 他是个非常平和而且有耐心的人，和他一起工作很愉快。

entry.def: An equable climate stays at an even temperature and has no sudden changes.

example.ex: The climate has grown more equable and the crop yields have risen.
example.tran: 天气变得更加温和，粮食产量也已经提高。

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强+equ相等,平均+ate……的→和所需的趋向相等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 稳定的,不变的,[脾气]温和的
stems_affixes.word_buile: equ相等,平均+able……的→[心情]能稳定的
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
ad加强+equ相等,平均+acy状态→[数量]已经加到相等了→够了
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal[adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于]+ity表名词→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
equate[v.同等看待,使相等]+ion表名词→n.[数学]等式,方程式;[with]相等;均衡
equ相等,平均+ity表名词→n.公平,公正
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
equ相等,平均+ate表动词→v.同等看待,使相等
